metadata.title: CVE-2021-3664 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - low
metadata.description:
url-parse is vulnerable to URL Redirection to Untrusted Site

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3664` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-url-parse - 1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: node-url-parse package in bionic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1.2.0-1ubuntu0.1').
